      • LayoutParams

        @Deprecated
public LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams other)
        已过时。 
        This constructor will be protected in version 0.5.

        Use from(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams) instead.

        参数:
        other - Source layout params.

      • LayoutParams

        @Deprecated
public LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams other)
        已过时。 
        This constructor will be protected in version 0.5.

        Use from(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams) instead as this constructor will not copy the margin params from the source layout.

        参数:
        other - Source layout params.
